title: EAI Oil Seal 2.250"x3.000"x0.375" TC Double Lip w/Spring. 2 1/4"x3"x3/8" Metal Case w/NBR Coating
features: !!SAME BUSINESS DAY SHIPPING!! SUPERIOR QUALITY and DURABILITY: EAI oil seals are engineered with sturdy carbon steel spring and high strength nitrile rubber for reliable and long-lasting performance. This 2.25" ID rubber cover seal is lightweight and not easy to age

SEAL OFF LEAKAGE and DIRT: No more getting stressed up by spills from your rotary elements! Crafted with rubber, garter spring, and inner metal case, this inch nitrile oil seal effectively prevents the leakage of lubricants and prevents the entry of dust and dirt into your precious machine.

DIMENSION: Featured size of 57.15mm x 76.2mm x 9.53mm. The perfect double lip oil seal for autos, motorcycle crankshafts, camshafts, axle shafts, machinery, water pumps, valves, front and rear wheels, and vehicle engines.
HIGH-TEMPERATURE RESISTANCE: With its 70A Nitrile Butadiene Rubber cover material design, this spring loaded inch rotary shaft will withstand temperatures from -40℉ to 226℉

HYDROCARBON FLUIDS: Engineered for the hydrocarbon fluids sealing environment, this 2.25"x3"x0.375" TC oil seal boosts a good resistance to grease, mineral oil, hydraulic fluids, and petroleum oil. What more, this seal has low swelling in water, ensuring long term use.
description: ENJOY SMOOTH MACHINE PERFORMANCE WITH LESS LEAKAGES AND BREAKDOWNS

In machine components, leakages can lead to intermixture of different mediums or lead to harmful contaminants entering your machinery. That is why a shaft oil seal is an essential component of your delicate machine.

Made for superior sealing performance, this oil seal utilizes a rubber cover for stable seal ability and tight fit, an internal metal case reinforcement for improved rigidity on the seal, and a steel garter spring for constant pressure on the shaft for effective sealing.
This rubber oil seal promises to
keep out dirt and other contaminants
avoiding leakage of lubricants or chemicals
Designed to OEM specifications with carbon steel spring and nitrile butadiene rubber material.
